title: Cute Acoustic Music Pack
description: This collection features a blend of acoustic instruments including guitars, ukuleles, and pianos, creating a warm and happy atmosphere. These tracks are perfect for casual games such as adventures, puzzle games, platformers, and simulations.
longDescription:
Welcome to the Cute Acoustic Music Pack by Carxofa Music. This collection features a blend of acoustic instruments including guitars, ukuleles, pianos, and more, creating a warm and happy atmosphere.


These tracks are perfect casual games with a cute and cozy aesthetic, such as adventures, puzzle games, platformers, and simulations.


Here you can preview a sample of each track
technicalDetails:
The Cute Acoustic Music Pack includes


  • 10 Original Tracks (WAV 44.1 kHz 16 bit, loop seamless)
  • 2 or 3 Alternative Mixes of each track with different instruments
  • 4-6 stems for each track with the instruments grouped by families (keys, guitars, etc...)
  • 5-20 tracks of each track with each instrument individually
  • A file with all the necessary information for each track (BPM, key, duration, time signature, etc...). 


If you don't need all this files, you can find a LITE version just with the main files at an affordable price


Number of Audio Wavs: 202

Number of Audio Cues: 202

Sample rate / bit rate: WAV 44.1kHz 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 21:50min min (More than an hour including Alternative Mixes and Stems)

Supported Development Platforms: ALL

Documentation: https://www.carxofamusic.com/cute-acoustic-music-pack/


If you need more information please, contact with me

Carxofa Music
